original_text: She saw two angels there. They were wearing white clothes. They were sitting where Jesus' dead body had been. One angel was sitting where Jesus' head had been. The other angel was sitting where his feet had been.
korean_text: 흰 옷 입은 두 천사가 예수의 시체 뉘었던 곳에 하나는 머리 편에, 하나는 발 편에 앉았더라

sentences.original_text: They were sitting where Jesus' dead body had been.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예수의 시체가 있던 곳에 앉아 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: One angel was sitting where Jesus' head had been.
sentences.korean_translation: 한 천사는 예수의 머리가 있던 곳에 앉아 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: The other angel was sitting where his feet had been.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 천사는 그의 발이 있던 곳에 앉아 있었습니다.
